title: Ottoman map, response to loss of empire

content.question: Which of the following was the primary Ottoman response to the processes depicted in Map 2 ?

choices.label: Attempts to convert the empireâ€™s non-Muslim population to Islam
Efforts to transform the empire into a parliamentary democracy
Attempts to reconcile Islamic law with Marxist ideals
Efforts to reform the government despite considerable internal opposition

content.answer: Efforts to reform the government despite considerable internal opposition

topic.text: 5.8: Reactions to the Industrial Economy from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
